entry.title: Is debit is '+' and credit is '-' is same in SAP SD & SAP MM ECC & S/4 HANA?
Can SAP S4 display thumbnails in the corner of MD04 and other key sales and purchasing screens?
entry.content: It would really help users understand what the materials are and lower the risk of incorrect ordering and purchasing if there was a thumbnail of the material in the thumbnails in the corner of MD04 and other key sales and purchasing screens.

Regards,

entry.title: Best practices for embedding analytics and reporting
entry.content:
Hello Team,

Could you please suggest best practices for embedded analytics and reporting where I have to create custom CDS, custom analytical queries and multi-dimensional reports along with KPI creations.

Best Regards,
Malika Bathla.

entry.title: Drilldown and Navigate to in multi dimensional report of custom analytical queries
entry.content:
Hello Team,

On S/4 Hana private cloud, I have a requirement to create custom analytical queries as end user and be able to add new navigations on my queries and remove few standard navigations coming via standard semantics of added fields.

Is it possible to do so? Can we change the order of navigations shown in custom analytical queries - standard navigations displayed?
Can we remove the one not needed and can we add new for new custom field (if added)?

Also, is it possible to get link on line item shown in the table view of multi dimesional report?

Best Regards,
Malika Bathla.

entry.title: S/4HANA Cloud CBO logic: Read BP Attachment, Base64, and store as 500-char chunks?
entry.content:
System: SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition and Private Edition
Extensibility: Key-User Custom Business Object (CBO) 

Preparation step: A PDF is attached to the Business Partner with filename

Desired behavior (in CBO logic)

  1. Read the BP attachment

  2. Encode binary to Base64.

  3. Split into 500-character parts.

  4. Save those parts into CBO(multiple rows/items).

Questions for the community

  1. Is there a released (whitelisted) API that CBO key-user logic can call to read a Business Partner attachment by filename or attachment ID?

  2. Are HTTP/OData calls allowed from CBO logic for this purpose?
  3. If direct read from CBO logic is not supported, what is the recommended pattern?

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: How can I test external integration with SAP if I don‚Äôt have access to a company SAP system?
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I‚Äôd like to test an integration between an external system and SAP using REST APIs.

Is it possible to build or test REST APIs in the free trial of SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition?

Currently, I don‚Äôt have access to any internal SAP system at my company.

If the S/4HANA Cloud trial doesn‚Äôt allow such integration, would it be feasible to use an ABAP Developer Edition or SAP IDES (on-premise) system for this kind of external API testing?

Thanks in advance for your guidance! üôè

entry.title: CDS Calculate previous month from input parameter
entry.content:
I need to create CDS to calculate pervious Month / Year based on the input.

Example:

define view ZTST_PM with parameters

p_FiscalPeriod : poper,

p_Fiscalyear : gjahr

 

Expected results: Input 008 / 2025- Expected output 007 ; Previous year = 2025

period 001 / 2025- Expected output 012 ; Previous year = 2024

 

Thanks in advance for your suggestions.

entry.title: Batch-specific UoM Proportion/product unit of measure GON invalid for item 000010 Message No. VL382
entry.content:
I've a scenario where I have a finished product managed by a Batch-specific UoM with type: Product Unit, and I am facing this error message when I try to make a delivery with the Alternative UoM (Product Unit) Reference to a Sales order with the Base UoM
"The sales Unit (Also the Base UoM) in the sales order is "KG" and the Alternative/required UoM in the Outbound delivery is "GON" 

"GON" UoM is a custom UoM created equivalent to the UoM: "BAG"

Note: this scenario has been tested in MM by creating a PO with UoM: "KG" and MIGO GR by UoM: "GON" and it's working properly

The error message:

Proportion/product unit of measure GON invalid for item 000010

Message No. VL382

entry.title: Not reflecting Total Fixed/Variable quantities and values in CPTD & CPTA? In costing
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

Can anyone help me in this issue, there is no error but i don't reflecting the fixed/variable quantities and values while executing the CPTD i.e. Actual Template Allocation: for production order. Furthermore, the production order contains the quantities. Can anyone suggest what are main configuration points i must check and while process of creating and confirming the production order and its movement type 101, 321 and 322 is the customize process, it will impact on CPTD AND CPTA?
I have also attached the image of CPTA and need to know that it's the configuration issue or another due to custom process of production order?

entry.title: Guidance: creating 4 separate pricing procedures for OR/RE/CR/DR (learning)
entry.content:
My mentor asked me to build four separate pricing procedures for OR (standard sale), RE (return), CR (credit memo request), DR (debit memo request). Could you please advise:

  1. How to set up these four procedures end-to-end in a simple, standard way?

  2. Which parts should be shared across all, and which should be separate per procedure?

  3. How to set Document Pricing Procedure (DPP) per sales order type and map OVKK so each order uses the correct procedure?

  4. For RE (returns): which conditions do you usually keep vs. drop, and how to handle signs and tax correctly?

  5. For CR/DR: what‚Äôs the minimal set of conditions that still posts correctly to FI?

  6. In Copy Control with references, which Pricing Type  do you recommend for RE/CR/DR, and when?

Thanks! This is a learning sandbox, so any concise tips or references are much appreciated.

entry.title: Principal Propagation failing between BTP Mobile Services, Cloud Connector and S/4 HANA - Access Den
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I'm experiencing an issue with Principal Propagation when connecting SAP Mobile Development Kit (MDK) application through BTP Mobile Services to an on-premise S/4 HANA system via Cloud Connector.

Current Setup:

  • Source: SAP Mobile Services (BTP)
  • Middleware: SAP Cloud Connector
  • Target: SAP S/4 HANA on-premise (Client 400)

Problem Description:

When I configure the connection in Mobile Services to use "Cloud Connector SSO" as the SSO mechanism and try to test it using the "Launch in Browser" button, I receive the following error:

 
Access denied to system molinos.rise:8000. In case this was a valid request, ensure to expose the system correctly in your cloud connector.

However, the same OData service works perfectly when:

  1. Accessed directly from the S/4 HANA system browser
  2. Using a BTP Destination with Basic Authentication (username/password)

But it fails when using Principal Propagation authentication method.

Current Configuration:

Cloud Connector:

  • Principal Type: X.509 Certificate
  • Resources: / exposed with "Path And All Sub-Paths"

Connection to S/4 HANA: ‚úÖ Active

What I've Already Checked:

‚úÖ Cloud Connector can reach S/4 HANA system (green status) ‚úÖ OData service is active in SICF ‚úÖ Resource "/" is exposed in Cloud Connector ‚úÖ Virtual-to-internal host mapping is correct ‚úÖ Basic Authentication works (confirms the OData service itself is working) ‚úÖ Cloud Connector certificate appears to be in STRUST

Questions:

  • Is there any additional trust configuration needed between BTP, Cloud Connector, and S/4 HANA for X.509 certificate-based SSO?
  • Are there any specific authorizations my user needs in S/4 HANA to consume OData services via Principal Propagation? (Besides the standard OData consumption authorizations)

How can I verify that the Cloud Connector is correctly sending the certificate/user information to S/4 HANA?

Logs/Additional Info:

The error appears immediately when clicking "Launch in Browser" in Mobile Services. The Cloud Connector audit log shows the request is being blocked at the Cloud Connector level with the "Access denied" message.

Any guidance on the correct configuration steps or troubleshooting approach would be greatly appreciated!

Thank you in advance for your help.

Best regards

entry.title: Issue with IDoc File Line Endings (LF vs. CRLF) After S/4HANA Migration
entry.content:
We are interfacing with an external system using IDoc files.

After our migration to S/4HANA, the newline character in the output files has changed to LF (Line Feed), which has caused the external system to be unable to recognize and process them.

The entire process, from IDoc transmission to file output, is handled using standard SAP functionality; we are not using any custom programs for this.

Since modifying the external system to accept LF is not an option, we need to find a way to convert the output to CRLF within our SAP system.

Could you please advise on the best method to achieve this?

entry.title: Invoice Print Type - IDOC vs Form (Fragmented Forms)
entry.content:
Hello Gurus,

I'm looking for some inspiration and war stories from you talented people.
Are we the only ones struggeling with the Print Type settings in the pricing procedure when controlling output in the our Adobe Forms as well as INVOIC IDOC?

Background: In our pricing procedure we're using Print Type to control both line item pricing display on the form as well as determine value in IDOC Segment E1EDP26 (INVOIC02). Business wants these two outpu to differ in certain countries - E.g. Form to show a set of pricing, while IDOC typically containing more.

We have tried: Changing the content of the form directly, supressing values from the Print Type setting, leaving a mismatch between Print Type and actual print. However, using the same form across multiple countries, following method significantly increases complexity.

Have any of you successfully managed to separate the Print Type setting for the form content from IDOC content? Any advice on how to implement the split?

Appreciate you time,
Best regards,
Aske

SAP S/4HANA SD (Sales and Distribution)

entry.title: ME21N error received when trying to access Quantity tab
entry.content:
When PO is being created against a contract alough the PO quantity tab is visable the following error message happens when clicked on: 

Document type F ZPSO for qty.schedule not active

    Message No. O1080

I have checked SPRO but cannot find a place to activate purchase document type per the error message information.

entry.title: How to Download Adaptation Project Deployed to S/4HANA On-Premise System
entry.content:
For UI5 Apps and legacy UI5 Extension Projects, the project source is deployed to the UI5 ABAP Repository as a BSP Application, and program /UI5/UI5_REPOSITORY_LOAD can be used to download the source files in a ZIP file (at least those that were included in the deployment).

Adaptation Projects are deployed to the Layered Repository, not the UI5 ABAP Repository, and so the same program cannot be used. Is there an alternative program which can download the adaptation project source from the Layered Repository in a similar way? Is there a way to extract an adaptation project from an S/4HANA On-Premise system using Fiori Tools in BAS or VS Code?

entry.title: clean core proxy isn't commited
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I try to code my first clean core application using application job. In this app I create some orders. Therefore I made a proxy for BAPI_PO_CREATE1 (note 3496669). But for some reasons the bapi isn't commited by the framework (Fuba is called with destination none). Neither application job nor rap object create my order. The only thing that works is when I program a BAPI_TRANSACTION_COMMIT into the proxy. But that can't be right, can it? What do you think?

Thanks and regards
Bernd

entry.title: New certificate renewal process
entry.content:
Hello Team,

 

We are currently in the process of renewing certificates for our project.
For example, the existing certificate details are as follows:
CN=*

 

We plan to replace the organization name from O=* to O=**
Previously, when a certificate expired, we followed the steps below:
Step 1: If the certificate was expired or about to expire, we generated a new CSR from STRUST and requested a signature from the business team.
Step 2: Once approved, we received the signed certificate via email and downloaded it to our local system.
Step 3: If the certificate was self-signed, we imported the Root + CA + System certificates into STRUST.
Step 4: If the certificate was local, we imported it from the system and updated it.
Step 5: After updating the certificate in the system, we distributed it across applications and, if required, performed an ICM restart for the SSL certificate to take effect.

 

Since we are now changing the organization name, we would like your suggestions on the process.
Additionally, we have observed that some certificates in the system have already expired.

 


Please advise on the next steps as well as is there any easy steps to import the certificate.


Thank you,


--- Support Assistant ---
I have a problem in transaction STRUST


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: How to export DOKIL table data using R3trans DOCU object
entry.content:
We need to export DOKIL table data alone using R3trans out of production system and import the same into QA system.

This link:

https://help.sap.com/docs/ABAP_PLATFORM_NEW/4a368c163b08418890a406d413933ba7/3dad5cb14ebc11d182bf0000e829fbfe.html?version=202310.latest

talks about how to do it.  But can someone please give correct syntax for R3trans export control file  to export data out of DOKIL table as DOCU.

 

Thanks in advance,

Nagesh
